description:
A distribution facility in Montebello ,CA is looking for a motivated Warehouse Clerk to join their team!

The starting pay rate is $20/hr

This Is a Long Term Position With Benefits

Open Shift:

  • 1st shift: Monday - Friday 6:30 am - 3:00 pm + Overtime

Requirements:

  • Shipping and receiving
  • Forklift experience is preferred
  • Experienced in a fast paced shipping environment
  • Able to lift up to 50 lbs. without accommodation
  • SAP experience is a plus, but not required
  • Warehouse/distribution duties

Please reply with your resume or contact Robert Pilon directly at Aerotek (City of Industry, CA location)

Thank you!

About Aerotek:

We know that a company's success starts with its employees. We also know that an individual's success starts with the right career opportunity. As a Best of Staffing® Client and Talent leader, Aerotek's people-focused approach yields competitive advantage for our clients and rewarding careers for our contract employees. Since 1983, Aerotek has grown to become a leader in recruiting and staffing services. With more than 250 non-franchised offices, Aerotek's 8,000 internal employees serve more than 300,000 contract employees and 18,000 clients every year. Aerotek is an Allegis Group company, the global leader in talent solutions. Learn more at Aerotek.com.

The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.
